content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Yi-Nuo Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Greetings, Yi-Nuo Wang. As a private landlord seeking the highest potential rent, I must emphasize that this unfurnished, newly built 50 square meter one-bedroom apartment in the city center's prime location comes with a competitive price tag. However, to commence negotiations, please propose an initial rental price. If we reach an agreeable figure, I'll respond with 'I agree to the price of [x] Euro!' Should we fail to align, I'll indicate the reason for ending discussions. TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
